name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A Boeing 737 passenger plane of Jeju Air in South Korea crashed, killing 179 people.
It is said on the Internet that one of the victims sent a message to his mother before the plane crashed: "Mom" "She said that the plane seemed to be stuck by a bird and could not land, so she asked me to call"
"Because you didn't answer, I left a message, Mom, I love you"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, Xinhua News Agency selected the top ten domestic news in 2024: 
Article 7: Adhere to the development of full-process people's democracy and better play the superiority of the political system.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 29, Dongguan, Guangdong. A man came to a park and was stopped by security guards. The security guards said that the fenced area was all government units, and you can be outside but not inside.
Netizens responded, "Is this the Royal Garden?" "Find a way to fence off the sun"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A mother in her 50s successfully fought cancer for more than a year. After her health finally improved, she went on a trip, but she didn't expect to embark on a road of no return....
The screenshot is the last conversation between Kim's brother and sister (22 years old and 15 years old) and their mother. The mother sent a text message to her son on the 27th, the second day after she went on a trip to Bangkok with her friends.
The childish brother and sister held hands and kept staring at the TV broadcasting the accident news at the airport. The first floor of the airport building was filled with screams and cries of the bereaved, and two funeral cars were parked in the parking lot in front of the building.
The brother and sister were staying at their home in Gwangju that day. When they heard the news of the accident, they hurried from Gwangju to Muan Airport. The brother and sister said, "Because I don't watch the news on weekdays, I didn't know the news. I learned about it when my mother's friend contacted me around 12 noon." He cried and said, "I took a relative's car to the airport."
The mother of the brother and sister was in her early 50s and had been fighting stomach cancer for more than a year...

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A blogger in Jianshan Village, Xiangcheng Town, Zoucheng City, Shandong Province, posted a video exposing the illegal sand mining in the area. He was followed by an unknown vehicle during the investigation.
Dozens of trucks were involved in the illegal sand mining, crushing the villagers' asphalt roads and cement village roads.
Netizens in the comment area admired the blogger's courage and asked him to pay attention to safety.
Informed netizens revealed that the town government leadership team used various projects to privately dig and trample on basic farmland for several years, stealing sand and stones and making a fortune of more than 100 million yuan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, after the incident of Li Yixue being diagnosed with mental illness and missing in Nanchang, Jiangxi, many people across the country began to boycott Nanchang. Many netizens posted videos appealing that everyone should not do business with Nanchang, not buy goods from Jiangxi, not receive express delivery from Jiangxi, etc. On various platforms, everyone is still trying their best to speak up for Li Yixue, risking being blocked and being teased.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Wuwei, Gansu: Parents were kicked out of the group for questioning the late assignment of homework. Follow-up:
Under media attention, the parent rejoined the group, and the English teacher sent a "warm welcome" emoticon. A parent took the initiative to speak on behalf of the parents involved and said: It's okay, I understand the teacher
"The head teacher and the English teacher apologized. The school held a meeting to emphasize that WeChat will not allow assignments in the future, and all assignments will be assigned on the blackboard on time"
Online comment: Assigning homework so late will affect the birth rate of newborns

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Follow-up of the school cafeteria in Benxi, Liaoning, feeding students with leftovers from the trash can:
The State Council Food Safety Office, together with the Ministry of Education and the State Administration for Market Regulation, summoned the main person in charge of the People's Government of Benxi City, Liaoning Province on the 27th, but no punishment was imposed
The summons required that Benxi City must improve its political stance, always tighten the string of food safety, and effectively enhance the sense of responsibility, urgency and mission of doing a good job in the region;
We must take effective measures to further consolidate the responsibilities of all parties for campus food safety, re-check risks and hidden dangers, and re-attack law enforcement and case handling, and do a good job in problem rectification and implementation; We must insist on learning from one case and applying it to other cases, not only "immediately change", but also "long-term", promote the improvement of campus food safety system, and effectively ensure the food safety of students in school.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, CCTV exposed that fake cashmere sweaters were openly sold in the live broadcast room, and they were not afraid of reporting and banning their accounts.
Not only are the ingredients proportions falsely marked, but wool or other animal fibers are even sold as cashmere. In the live broadcast room, a raccoon cashmere product was promoted as a 100% cashmere cashmere sweater
There are also sweaters that are obviously wool sweaters, but are labeled as "pure cashmere".
If you sell counterfeit goods in a live broadcast room, you are not afraid of being reported or banned. After the account is banned, you will immediately open a new account and sell live broadcasts day and night.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, Xinhua News Agency selected the top ten news of the year, including:
Headline of the year: The whole party carried out party discipline study and education in a solid manner, and promoted the in-depth development of comprehensive and strict party governance
5. Head of state diplomacy wrote a magnificent new chapter
6. The gradual delay of retirement reform plan was introduced to promote the full utilization of human resources
7. Adhere to the development of the whole process of people's democracy and better play the superiority of the political system
8. The Party Central Committee deployed a package of incremental policies, the economy rebounded and the comprehensive national strength was enhanced

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, rows of isolation columns were erected outside a subway station in Tianhe District, Guangzhou to prevent "electric chickens" from illegally parking. The density was like "plum blossom piles". Some citizens felt that it affected the city appearance, while others said that although it was not good-looking, it did improve the situation where the subway entrance was blocked by motorcycles. Citizens said: The most important thing is to solve the problem of where to park, otherwise they will still park illegally somewhere else. Netizens said: It is inconvenient for wheelchairs and baby strollers to travel

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Langfang, Hebei Province invented the "climate loan", which is suspected to be used to solve the problem of corporate reconstruction caused by the flood in Beijing in July 23, when the flood was released to Hebei to "protect Beijing and Xiong'an".
Netizens in the comment area mocked: "Is there a loan within a loan?" "Is there a loan for the next life?" "Is there a gift loan?"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 29, former US President Jimmy Carter died at the age of 100. On January 1, 1979, while in office, he bypassed Congress and severed diplomatic relations with the Republic of China and established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The first-instance verdict of the case of the murder of junior high school students in Handan, Hebei Province was announced: three people were sentenced to life imprisonment, twelve years, and no criminal punishment respectively.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the night of December 30, a fire broke out in the 7th dormitory building of Beijing University of Science and Technology. The corridor was completely blackened, but the smoke alarms in the entire corridor did not sound. This was at least the third fire in the school this year. The school has carried out multiple fire safety hazard inspections, but fires still occur one after another. According to many students, the dormitory management did not issue warnings and evacuation in the first time of the fire.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, a blogger questioned the illegality of the auxiliary police's law enforcement alone during a drunk driving inspection, and asked the traffic police to come before the drunk driving inspection. He was then threatened and warned by the auxiliary police, and even warned a second time, saying that if the blogger did not cooperate with their work, they would take coercive measures. The law stipulates that auxiliary police do not have the qualifications to enforce the law and need to carry out auxiliary work under the command, supervision or leadership of the police. The auxiliary police's behavior is suspected of being illegal. The blogger is defending his legal rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 29, Inner Mongolia. A teacher from a first-class university said in class: After giving birth to a child, God will bless you and let you live longer. If you donâ€™t believe it, go and see those â€œparticularly awesome womenâ€ whose life spans are very short, while there are many old ladies in the village who have given birth to eight or ten children and live to be 90-100 years old, and their chances of getting sick are also very low.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Hong Kong tourism industry insiders: Mainland tourists' retail spending power has fallen by 60% compared to before the epidemic.
Hong Kong Quality Tourism Services Association Chairman Huang Jielong said on Saturday that the spending power of mainland tourists has fallen a lot from the high level before the epidemic, especially the retail sales, which have fallen from an average of more than 5,000 Hong Kong dollars per person before the epidemic to more than 2,000 Hong Kong dollars now, a sharp drop of 60%.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
The Afghan Taliban ordered the sealing of windows in residential houses. Overlooking women's activities may lead to indecent behavior.
A Taliban government spokesman issued a statement on Saturday saying that new homes in Afghanistan must not have windows that can see "yards, kitchens, neighbors' wells and other areas commonly used by women."
The statement quoted the order of the top leader as saying: "Seeing women working in the kitchen, yard or drawing water from the well may lead to indecent behavior."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, China News Service interviewed primary school students about "the big things in 2024"
A student answered: The US president has changed (Trump was elected as the US president) It just feels a bit magical.
At present, the clip has been deleted, the barrage function has been turned off, and the comment area has opened selected comments.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 29 (Released) Shandong. Elderly people talk about the evolution of China's family planning policy in recent decades, from "Family planning is good, the government will take care of the elderly" in 1985 to "Supporting the elderly is an obligation, it is shameful to push it to the government" in 2023. At present, the original video has been deleted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 29 (Released) Sichuan Ziyang. All teachers of Lezhi Middle School reported the principal Tan Chaohua, and the report listed many corrupt behaviors of the principal, such as falsifying papers, charging unreasonable fees, and showing off wealth all day long.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 26, Maoming, Guangdong. The local government sent people to forcibly dig up the longan fruit trees in Liantang Village to restore arable land. The villagers watched the fruit trees they had worked so hard to plant being sawed off, and they had no choice but to kneel down and beg the workers for mercy.
Netizens replied, "Good land can be used for real estate, but not for fruit trees."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, the pixel-style 2D game "BZZZT" supports 11 languages, and it has caused controversy because the game does not include Chinese. Some Chinese players believe that the lack of Chinese in the game is disrespectful to Chinese players, and some comments have elevated this behavior to a political accusation, saying that the game developer supports Taiwan independence.
Currently, the game has a surge in negative reviews, and the game author Ko.dll asked players to understand his limitations as an independent developer and hoped to gain more patience and support.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Ms. Xie from Chengdu, Sichuan, was abused by her husband 16 times in the past two years, resulting in multiple organ damages throughout her body. She needs to wear a fecal bag for life. She tried to escape several times, but was found by her husband using "Skynet".
Recently, in a live show in Jiangxi City, the host and the lawyer called this matter "It is difficult for a clean official to judge family affairs" and they both smiled when talking about it, which aroused dissatisfaction and resistance from many netizens.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 30, Shangqiu, Henan. The man said that his grandfather was first-level disabled and his grandmother was ill. He had applied for subsistence allowances to the town government many times, but the government had a bad attitude and passed the buck. He was also threatened by the brigade leaders not to apply for subsistence allowances, and if he did, his family would be detained. And because he did not give the leaders 2,000 yuan, the leaders blocked his grandfather from applying for subsistence allowances. The man said, "Isn't this pushing us to death?"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, many hospitals across the country have reported salary cuts or only basic wages.
Zeng Weigen, deputy director of the General Surgery Department of Beijing Chaoyang Hospital, said that many hospitals have started to cut salaries a long time ago, and some hospitals have even gone bankrupt. When asked about the reasons, he said that for most public hospitals, the state's funding accounts for less than 10% of the hospital's income, and the rest of the money needs to be earned by doctors themselves.
In addition, the state has cancelled the drug and equipment markup, resulting in hospitals selling drugs and even losing money.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 29 (Released) Shanwei, Guangdong. It was revealed online that Lin Weihao, a 19-year-old man from Chikeng Town, was brutally dismembered after being killed, and his head and other limbs were thrown in different places by the murderer.
According to his family, after the murderer is arrested, the elder brother of one of the murderers will be acquitted. The two brothers committed the crime together and conspired to give a confession, so that the younger brother would bear the responsibility alone.
And after the two brothers committed the crime, the elder brother also posted updates on social media about eating, drinking and having fun.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, comedian "Da Bing" promoted the liquor "Xijiu" on social media platforms. Because the title above the live broadcast room read "Xijiu Spendthrift Special", some netizens associated it with Xi Jinping.
Later, Da Bing removed the word "Spendthrift" in the live broadcast room and changed it to "Xijiu New Year Goods Festival"
At present, the relevant live broadcast videos have been deleted by the platform one after another.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The President of Azerbaijan said that the passenger plane was shot down by Russia and demanded that Russia admit its mistake and pay compensation. Both Chinese official media and foreign media reported the news. However, some netizens still refused to believe it and believed that the responsibility for the crash lay with the United States or Ukraine: "(I think) the main responsibility is not Russia, but should be shared by the United States and Ukraine" "There are Ukrainian terrorists on the plane" "It must have been shot down by the US air defense"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
CICC released its 2024 forecast at the beginning of this year, including: China's economy will stabilize and rebound, bullish on A-shares, the US economy faces a recession, bearish on US stocks, bearish on the US dollar, etc.
As 2025 approaches, this forecast has once again sparked discussion among netizens, who said "there are too many political positions", "10 points for position, 0 points for professionalism", "it's better to flip a coin"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: @Li_memecoin welcomes everyone to participate ğŸ±!

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Behind the stinky cars, there are online taxi drivers who live in their cars.
As winter approaches, many netizens have reported their experiences of getting stinky cars on social platforms. The reason is that in addition to the low price of sedans, the decorative materials are average, and some drivers choose to live in their cars to save money.
In recent years, as the price of online taxis continues to decline, drivers have to spend more time to take orders for sports cars in order to earn higher incomes. Some drivers live directly in their cars in order to receive more orders, which also saves rent.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
According to Russian media reports, in the Kursk region, a North Korean soldier shot and killed three Russian soldiers due to language problems during the retreat. The soldier has been detained.
According to reports, 50 North Korean soldiers were sent to attack Ukrainian positions, with a supervision team behind them to prevent them from escaping and cowardly fighting. When the North Korean soldiers charged, they were attacked by Ukrainian artillery and drones, resulting in heavy casualties. So some soldiers began to retreat, but were stopped by the Russian army and questioned about the reason for their escape. Due to the language barrier, the two sides failed to communicate, so a North Korean soldier shot at the Russian army and shot and killed three Russian soldiers. The North Korean soldier who fired the gun has been detained, but there is basically no way to punish him except to send him to the next charge again.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 29, famous farmers in Yongfu County, Guilin City went to the Labor Bureau to seek help and ask for their wages.
 On December 30, in Luoyang, Henan, Jianye was in ruins, and the owners wanted an explanation at the city government.
December 30, Liaoning. Sanitation workers were owed five months' wages and went on strike to demand wages.
On December 30, a 17-year-old student from the Guangxi Commerce and Tourism Technical School died while being sent to Guangdong for internship. Family members held banners outside the school to defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 30 (Released) Nanjing, Jiangsu. It was reported online that a student at Nanjing Sanpailou Primary School was unwell during school, but the teacher did not pay much attention to it. Later, when the student was doing eye exercises during the break, he suddenly fell to the ground and could not get up. The child is still in the ICU, with only a weak heartbeat maintained by the instrument. The family members questioned that there was no surveillance in the classroom. On the 30th, the family members defended their rights outside the school, and the police were on the scene to maintain stability.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Zhang Weiwei, a professor at Fudan University, said: If Trump wants to restore the US economy, he can only rely on China. The only country that can really help Trump with the industrial problems he is facing today is China.
But whether we should help him, to what extent, or not, is up to us in China to decide.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: According to online reports, at the recent Bay Area Business Conference held in Guangzhou, economist Ma Guangyuan said: "Our future will be difficult and the economy will decline further unless the government gives money to all citizens." "Other governments encourage consumption by giving money, but our government encourages consumption by issuing documents." This speech has now been deleted on Weibo.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 30, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Xinjiekou Management Committee: No New Year's Eve countdown activities will be held in Xinjiekou business district on the night of December 31, and people are encouraged not to gather and no balloons will be sold.
Videos shot by local residents show that iron sheets have been erected around the Xinjiekou business district. Some netizens said that they bought 500 balloons this year, but they were all lost because of a notice.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 29 (Released) Shaoshan, Hunan. Young people hold up the little red book of Mao Zedong's quotations.
Photographer: "I am very pleased and moved. They are the real hope of our China"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On this day of that year: On December 30, 2022, Ukrainian Armed Forces soldier Oleksandr Macievsky was shot dead by Russian troops after shouting "Glory to Ukraine".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 29, Jiangsu. A civil servant posted that she met a man 10 years older than her at a dinner party, and then he began to pursue her, but she refused on the grounds that she had a boyfriend. The man then "opened" the information of the woman and her boyfriend, and later learned that the man's grandfather was a founding general and his father was a senior military officer. The man also said, "Provincial and departmental leaders come to visit my home every year with big bags and small bags" and "Deputy division-level officials are like ants in our family."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, Yue Xiaoyong, the Chinese Foreign Ministry's special envoy to Afghanistan, said: The West cannot only focus on the issue of Afghan women, and the right to development is also an important human right. 
"The United States and the West are still focusing on issues such as the rights of Afghan women, and by amplifying some one-sided voices, they continue to mislead the international community's understanding of Afghanistan and the Taliban regime."
